2-e-HlXOTA0VlvePd-aPvA.text: I went out on a date with my girlfriend who drove down from Maryland for Lunch. Service was above par, Both sandwiches were done well, and we enjoyed our time at Red Robin. The only complaint I had was the fact that the fries that were served with the burger were luke warm at best and I requested a new order, and received a fresh batch, hot. They were delicious.

OZhfgeoaZl1ChYoAPlxfaw.text: Some things on the menu are good. Other things not so much. Definitely overpriced, but nice for kids.

XYbCTZPHASiD3K6rBFUpUQ.text: Ate here as a party of eight (five kids and three adults). Great service; food was what we expected.

UJ2DWdY52Fl0xqqKi-VcGQ.text: My husband and I just left this place. Unbelievably filthy! They seated us at a table that had burger sauce on it and pieces of bread on the seat. I was disgusted. What made us get up and leave was the sections of tissues and fries left on the floor. I've been to a few McDonalds' that were cleaner than this. In search of a new burger joint.

hlg9wrcPCw7PuG1aEvUHOQ.text: Overpriced, bad service and basically not very good food.  Food ranged from average to almost inedible.  I 100% agree with Chad E

XeYcdL_7vU3244bOPXhdOQ.text: Nice Burgers and Good Service! I like the garlic fries!!!

6knfUy_l0qr3PiEy3jbNsw.text: I've been to a couple of different Red Robin locations, so far this one is my favorite. The southern charm burger was amazing!!! The staff was super friendly.

17Ve43Q-G_ClCO_djyae-w.text: After a horrible couple days at work I was extremely pleased to be pampered by the service here. Haley was such a pleasure to have as a server. She refilled our cups constantly and was always smiling. The food was also fantastic! Red Robin has good food in general but this has been the best one we have been to. The manager was also extremely friendly. We will be back for sure. Thanks for making my day!

RnSUUGV7Ie2IEPdl9dyZTg.text: Good grief, people, it's a chain restaurant. You pretty much know what you're going to get when you come here: decent food, plenty of it, at a reasonable price. If you go in expecting the best food you've ever had, you're gonna have a bad time. Recognize that this place calls itself "Red Robin Gourmet Burgers" for two reasons: 90% of the people who eat here equate "big and messy with lots of stuff on it" with "good burger," and "Red Robin Really Big and Messy Burgers That Taste Pretty Ok" didn't test as well with focus groups.   If you want a really good burger, go to a specialty burger joint that's not a chain. If you want a big burger loaded with a lot of flavorful things like bacon, jalapenos, avocado, and barbecue sauce, accompanied by a ton of fries and a frosty adult beverage, Red Robin would be a good choice.   Is it truly gourmet? Not hardly. Is it gourmet enough for most Americans? Definitely.   Anyway, I went to this location while in town on business. Nothing that I wasn't expecting, and just what I was looking for: a decent burger, some fries, and a frosty adult beverage on the company's dime. Service wasn't the best I've ever had but was perfectly acceptable, the food was plentiful and tasty, the beer was cold, and the company paid for it. Nothing to complain about.   In the future, folks, when you write a review of a chain restaurant, rate it according to your expectations of it as a chain, and don't try to be a food critic.

NnJ7YdI5bThuAxXV4l-9WA.text: I went here in June for my birthday. The burgers are excellent. It came medium well which was exactly what I ordered. The customer service was excellent.

L5PGsGJ6UXkSdTg6GaTqvw.text: I went after work and the place was very empty.   It was nice and clean though which was nice.   I was quickly seated and my server was helping others, but made sure she stopped by to introduce herself and let me know she would be back in a couple minutes.   It was actually really cold in the restaurant and I was a little on the uncomfortable side because of it.    My server was very friendly and was almost too friendly.  She was super nice.  She had my drink refills at my table before I was finished with my first one.   The hamburger was tasty and very warm.  The fries were not crispy or hot and so I had to take off a star for that.   I really liked the personal devices at the table to pay your bill, browse through the menu, and even request refills and appetizers.

19-XhRbXSJN4HUexasEh8Q.text: We took the kids here on Friday to celebrate both our graduation. It was a big disappointment and I had to write a review before I forget!! Service was horrible, they were not busy at all, but it took us 45 minutes to get our food. Our waiter was not friendly at all and didn't care about us at all. We watch other servers tend to their customers quickly while ours didn't. I would see her trying to blame other people for the poor service to her other tables. We were there for over two hours which is ridiculous for this type of restaurant. When we left my husband told the manager their service was horrible...his only response was "what really??" No, apologies whatsoever.  Also we love the strawberry freckle lemonade. However, the one here taste like cold water on ice only! We won't be going back to this location EVER!

U-UodcFYTQK6yAgyb72Zpg.text: Ah yes.  My first Red Robin Gourmet Burger.  Solo lunch on a Friday.  I ordered the Bacon Avacado burger, bunless with steamed broccoli on the side.  My anticipation growing.  First bite, dry, well done.  I thought I ordered "as rare as possible".  Avacado?  Nope.  Some tasteless guacamole that likely came from a can.  At least the bacon was good......but $12 for this?  First impression was not good.  I've been told its good, maybe they will get a second chance.

Gd1ei8dkNaz2D-3l9jtCgg.text: My wife, grandson and I had lunch there today. My wife's burger was just fine. I ordered the Chili Chili Cheeseburger which was cooked properly, but came with very little chili and even less cheese.  Our waitress brought me a cup of chili with a little cheese on it to add to my burger. My grandson has their kids pizza which came to us looking like it hadn't been cut. We spent $27.00 for this and I do feel ripped off.

FzHnOhZmzgi6ksWLhdEVJw.text: Excellent manager. The people at the table near us were being very rude/conniving and he dealt with it very professionally and was very accommodating. Also, they were out of truffles so he gave us 50% off another dessert instead. The waitress was also very polite. Excellent experience.

Vc_ihkBihKh63ijGukT8oQ.text: Good gourmet burgers and bottomless fries nice change of pace.Nice nice variety good service.

bUcCjwEGajkUMj9iuovhGQ.text: If you're looking for a burger from a chain restaurant this is an excellent pick! I dont like anything fancy on my burger but they have tons of options. Gotta love the bottomless fries too.

zwNUUKGURlSF775xm_jlxg.text: I was there on a Sunday afternoon when it was dead and the service was horrible. After receiving my food I had to wait 10 minutes for silverware while my food got cold all the while watching the wait staff stand around and do nothing. Instead of tending to my table my server was behind the bar making drinks. Managers were walking around but not one stopped at my table.

yB-sjvsEmWREbld2kqOwtA.text: I try not to eat at chains when I'm traveling, but since I have never eaten here I decided to give it a go. I had a burger with to-die-for fries. The server was very friendly and attentive, the food good and the atmosphere pleasant.

1noX9tjQpd9nBkKttBf-RA.text: Gourmet burgers? I must have been in the wrong restaurant because I did not see any. This place is decorated very nicely and festively. It looks like a nice place for kids to eat with all the statues of the bird, but the food left a lot to be desired. I had the mac and cheese with rib tips and my sister had the shrimp tacos. The shrimp tacos were very good. The shrimp were grilled to perfection and the cabbage added a nice crunch and the avocado mellowed every thing out. Now my mac and cheese on the other hand, I give 3 thumbs down. It was literally boiled pasta with no butter, milk or cheese with a drizzle of cheese like substance on top. I brought this to the waiters attention and he told me that that's how they make their mac and cheese. Smh. I returned the fail that they call mac and cheese and got shrimp tacos instead. Not sure if I'll ever return to this restaurant.

photos.caption: Photo of Red Robin Gourmet Burgers and Brews - Charlotte, NC, United States. Shrimp tacos. Delish!
Photo of Red Robin Gourmet Burgers and Brews - Charlotte, NC, United States. Worst mac and cheese I&#39;ve ever had.

IHMcoVH-6VdUXYIx3jvE1A.text: We go here all the time. Great burgers and fries. Good overall casual dining spot. When we're not sure where to go for dinner we choose Red Robin and we haven't been disappointed.

HXedRgScnqWqvpwUGH35gQ.text: I'm not that big of a fan of chains. My coworker, on the other hand, is so we decided to grab a (veggie) burger.  The waiter was friendly but not the brightest crayon in the box (we're talking Antique Brass or Timberwolf if you go by Crayola colors..). Here is the conversation we had while he was taking our orders. Me: "Uh, yeah. I'll have the Gardenburger without sauce." Him:  "would you like that medium, medium well or well done?"  Me: "wait, a VEGGIE burger?"  then he explains he's new and was told to ask that to everyone for any burger... then I explain that if he asks that for the veggie, chicken, salmon or cod burgers he's gonna get some akward reactions seeing they all have specific temperatures and cook times... Anyhow!  My veggie burger did in fact end up well done! Sorta crunchy and not so pleasant. The fries were a little soggy too.  I've been to Red Robin before so on a "oh hey, maybe we should go to this place" I give it a 2 of 5, as for a comparison of other Red Robin locations, I give this a 2.5 out of 5. No care went into the food preparation. That's what I get for going to a chain...

WwfZtNHZsUZtgiRMHAix4Q.text: So I noticed that they seated all the blacks in the back where the tv's and seating is not upgraded the server "Brandi" had a slight attidute and the only reason she got the tip that she did was because my dad was there. they had a new item that my dad tried some roast beef sandwhich that they tried  to make fancy and was over priced. it should have been called roast beef sandwhich with a dip. it will be awile before I come back

Tgn4UrZYl4mR65PIfHqqgg.text: Normally, I do not go to this Red Robin location, and for good reason. This experience at this Red Robin were nowhere near meeting expectations. I had a 6-top and the other guests on my cheque complained that their hamburgers were cold, the pop was not fresh and it was not worth the money at all. I don't think I'll return to this Red Robin location anytime soon, and to any Red Robin (at least) for the next couple of months.  Plus, it get's better; I didn't even make it out of the parking lot when I started feeling sick. Great.

_rz56I42wYsw9AQfMdk-6w.text: We have been to this place on several occasions.  The latest visit was the best yet.  The waitress was really on top of everything!  The food was really delicious and cooked exactly to our specifications.  Even though this is a chain, it's one of the best burger places around!  Yum!

Vmi2m3kZE2t10UCHPEDOig.text: Very disappointed.  My girlfriend and I went in to the bar area on a sunday they where not very busy and we sat down to place a to go order.  After about 15 min of no one saying anything to us and being passed over for those of a color not of our own we decided to leave.  I love red robin but this visit has just left me with a sick feeling.

RLryJPbizdlAVNYOoOQo-A.text: The food was great!!! The only thing was our server Lachelle. She barely checked on our table, or asked if we needed more fries or drinks, I guess she wasn't use to handling a big table. Over all a great place to eat at

6Okg6GV7O-1VBWyGFDSR_Q.text: Red Robin. I had never been at night, only during the day. Pleasant surprise. Friendly service, just a little slow. The Skinny Margarita is tasty. Good beer selection. The Gourmet  Burgers are good. I had one of the new ones with bacon, and the Angus was tasty. Asked to substitute a side salad for the fries... No problem. Again, this location has friendly folks, great service and darn good food for a Red Robin!

photos.caption: Photo of Red Robin Gourmet Burgers and Brews - Charlotte, NC, United States. Friendly and open.

seG9BU6AfteByFXEFRlxpw.text: This was my first experience at Red Robin and for starters the food was pretty good. The waitress Kelsey when she finally came to the table took about twenty minutes to receive a refill for all four of my guest. The burger a friend got wasn't the way he ordered the bacon was basically burnt. I understand you are busy or short staffed but this is terrible. Once time to pay the check the tablet wouldn't read the card so we informed the waitress and also asked for Togo boxes and Togo cups she attempted to swipe the card but it didn't work again and waitress walked off she was gone for about thirty minutes when she came back she went to the bar and stood and talked to someone sitting at the bar I literally had to yell across the restaurant to get her attention. At the end of the night I never received Togo boxes. That was a horrible first time experience

S5dpxs_oUdtIjsUDOD7yRg.text: This was my first time at this location and the food was good as usually. However this location was very busy and service was very slow.   It took my food awhile to come out and once the food was on the table it took a little longer to get my campfire (a must try) sauce to come. Although the service was ideal because the food is always on point I'll be back again and hopefully it's not too busy.

g_WgKHOayqEIicTAkv17yQ.text: Food was good (as always) but I didn't care for the staff. The hostess (dark black hair, think her name was Deb?) very friendly, but other than that no one else was that great. My waitress asked if I wanted lemon in my water, I said no, but surprise, they put one anyways. Ordered and appetizer and a burger and they both came out at the same time (not usually how people like it). Again food was the same as the others (good) but staff is not as good - that's why this location gets 3 stars.

photos.caption: Photo of Red Robin Gourmet Burgers and Brews - Charlotte, NC, United States. Ramen bun!

J_FZkei9HYMVqN-lCWL9pA.text: I've eaten here a few times. The burgers and salads are ALWAYS tasty. I love the variety they offer in a burger, the salads are really fresh and nothing beats the bottomless steak fries. The servers are friendly and never let you have an empty glass!

photos.caption: Photo of Red Robin Gourmet Burgers and Brews - Charlotte, NC, United States. I am addicted to the salads!!! Always fresh and the burger with crispy fried onions just makes my day!
Photo of Red Robin Gourmet Burgers and Brews - Charlotte, NC, United States. The new Purple Lemonade for $4.99. With free refills!  It taste fruity and has pear flavoring

MjjbbeBWlOw4GZgkMqlzwg.text: I went to lunch by myself it was a great. I had a chicken sandwich with the bottomless steak fries. My server was great. I love how they have the little kiosks on the tables now where you can play games and pay and even call your server.

z3ETlWyOMGQ2xvzLqTwLkA.text: I went to Red Robins twice this past year once for my birthday and another because I wanted a good burger. The servers are always really nice. The manager always checks in or serves the food also. Our food comes out fast and quick. I usually use their machines that's on the table to pay.

photos.caption: Photo of Red Robin Gourmet Burgers and Brews - Charlotte, NC, United States. Whiskey burger

0HGAQo7_-pJygkt0QMSeOg.text: The worse experience I have ever had... Order was wrong twice, drink came with flat soda, wedge salad had brown lettuce, and fries were cold both times they were brought with my meal (never asked or given refills). When all of this was disclosed to the manager, his ONLY reply was "Well, thanks for being patient". Charged for grilled onions that were left off of my burger and when I informed the waitress and told her I did not want them any longer, she stated OK yet proceeded to bring them in a condiment cup anyways (probably in order to keep the charge on my bill). The bartender was MIA most of the time, server not very present as well, not to mention I had to seat myself when I came in! I have been to the Northlake location, and several others due to my traveling career however this has to be the worse one out of them all...

3OJIHm0tfm-r1wqH9B7gWQ.text: Jordan was so pleasant and had superb mannerism. He made us feel like very special burger lovers.  Thanks Jordan, we will return.

d8CiK-W5wITrx7KA_vMNcg.text: Service was excellent and the food was great too!!! First time at this Red Robin. I was in Charlotte for Nascar and glad we stopped here. 4 different staff came by to make sure we were good. That's how you run a place of business

_jDQXhIw17FrFDfYgkGJHw.text: Sat at a booth in the bar area and have to say Ashley who was also working the bar, making milkshakes, and dealing with call ins and pick up orders was amazing.   She never stopped working or cleaning the whole time we were here. She also never let our drinks get below half a glass without a refill. A+ service even though they had this poor girl running all over the restaurant taking care of people.

ZI-oBzksOlNe2m3XeMMewA.text: This place is turning to be my favorite burger place! For one it bring back many memories. I've brought my children to Red Robin when it was at Kings Plaza. Now they are grown, so coming to this one in Charlotte reminds me of "The good 'old days" . It's a wonderful place, nice variety of burgers, wonderful atmosphere.

KAVxrpXUOZLkTIfWYt8UbA.text: Not the best location. The service is friendly, but disorganized. I think we had three or four servers take our order, and the final order was still wrong. We were one of maybe three couples on a Sunday afternoon, so I know it wasn't because it wasn't to busy.   Despite the service, it's still "Red Robin". So, it's a safe place to get decent food. You know what you are getting.

FX0FLgLOPalKSkIBY35qLA.text: Not a fan. Who charges so much extra to get 10 sweet potato fries instead of regular fries? Overpriced for what you're given and I won't be back due to that.

ng_bg8KHHx6S4GRJY02UNQ.text: Worst RedRobbin I have been. We were there on Sunday night before Labor Day. It took about 20 minutes for our draft beers, when I questioned our server, I was told that the bar tender is very busy,when half the restaurant was empty as it was 8:30 pm. Very poor service and we were accidentally charged for chips queso and entertainment fee for my 4 year old using the kiosk.Again no warnings on the fee for using the kiosk and no record for the wrong order of chips came from the kiosk. Absolutely pathetic not to warn the customers also no pleasantries by the server at the end after the check was processes. Really rude server with poor attitude.

dWP6ScVjdGo7vrY65U0ehw.text: Went there today for a bite to eat before driving home 3 1/2 hours. We were instantly greeted and the hostess even engaged in a bit of conversation. We were seated and our server didn't take long to arrive. I'm not sure of his name but he was very efficient and polite! Our food didn't take long to arrive and it was hot and fresh and they even remember to put no tomatoes. The little Ziosks on the table were a bit confusing when I wanted to pay in cash but use my Robins card for points. However the server showed me exactly how to use it. If I'm ever in the Charlotte area again, I will definitely be visiting this location again!

BF1AjkxC86ksWfLS82QSxQ.text: ZERO STAR REVIEW... SLOW delivery!! I ordered from here and it was supposed to be a 40-45 minute wait for delivery, which I thought was reasonable. Well, they kept changing the delivery time. I cancelled my order (for 5 people!) when it hit a 2.5 hour delivery time. When I called to cancel, they didn't even apologize!

RnYnp8-8Y2Xz35TRcE05OQ.text: I have been to many Red Robins and this is the  worst one. The servers stand around talking as the manager watching  this behavior and allows it. The service is slow and no attention to detail or customer service. You wait over ten minutes for food and drink refills. They advertise unlimited refills good luck getting them. We have been here over four times before I am leaving this review. Things have not changed.

nIWGFRcV-GlHEIrpZBwQ-g.text: Menu with a ton of different burgers?  Yes, please!  Unfortunately for Red Robin, it's a chain... so you can get your burger from one state to the next.  The university location seems to be fairly slow (not busy) but our server was nice enough.  We were there during peak lunch time and it was barely full.  I guess it's hard to get away from this place without dropping $12-15 dollars for lunch.  Granted it's a pretty hearty meal, but a bit expensive for lunch.  The dining room is kept clean and there is plenty of nick-knacks on the walls to look at to kill the time.  One thing that they have going for them is their "special" Red Robin seasoning, which unfortunately on my last trip was a bit solidified in the container which leads me to believe how long it has been sitting there or how NOT often they refill or keep that seasoning at it's best.  Mostly salt, but still.  If you are looking for a quick lunch... I wouldn't recommend this place since it was pretty relaxed.  I could see myself getting easily annoyed if I was trying to get somewhere since our server seemed to have fair command over the section, but it felt like the getting the checks took forever.

AKXrjGKousVtYv8AKXosKg.text: My boyfriend and I come here pretty often and we've always had excellent service. Our waitress is always nice, prompt, and our food is always hot and delicious. Our favorite part is the bottomless fries, they're always amazing! Their alcoholic drinks always have a good kick and I'm never disappointed. I would like to say that we tend to go on non-busy days and times so that might affect our service.

3rDEHufe9BCh4uT21qzuVw.text: It's ok. the mac and cheese was to blan. I ordered the royal burger it looked better then it tasted needs more seasoning fry's we're frys might try it again maybe it was a bad day for them

photos.caption: Photo of Red Robin Gourmet Burgers and Brews - Charlotte, NC, United States
Photo of Red Robin Gourmet Burgers and Brews - Charlotte, NC, United States

anZnJlSOCrxiR30zSSvigA.text: Disgusting. The server was rude and slow AF. Acted like she couldn't be bothered and loudly announced all the sections she couldn't sit me in. And I had to wait for the privilege of her to slooowly seat me. And then, walking past the kitchen was gross. Everything was sticky and dirty. Three servers walked past me like I didn't exist. Literally made eye contact and did nothing.  Avoid this location at all costs. If you insist on eating here, being sanitary wipes.

wlmWNXd_CXyq0nDmbTfh0Q.text: Friendly service. But my burger tasted overcook and the outside of it was burned a little. The aftertaste was not pleasant with burn in my mouth. The fries were just bland. I wouldn't go again based on that. I know why it has 3 stars now.

XANwq47Ysu5Wng9oUaDSsA.text: Lunch service was quick and efficient. Food was good- hot and fresh. The waitress was great. This is definitely a quick go to and get out if you work in the area.

ytRuRFSK-WxFdaCIoba3CA.text: Food was good but service was slow on a nonbusy night.   The bottomless fruit was good but overpowered by the apples (obviously because they are the cheapest fruit). The bottomless fries were very skimpy to the point where they may as well just offer/serve one healthy order of fries. It was okay.

SdP3BMTFYFCm1I-MxTQDwg.text: You can't go wrong with Red Robin! My family comes here a few times a month and the staff does remember us, which is great. One waitress who no longer works there knew my parents' order by heart, which they loved and now another waitress is trying to do the same thing. :)  Who can beat bottomless fries? We always ask for them to bring some before the food comes since they are so yummy. I love getting them with buzzard wing sauce and ranch dipping sauce and covering them with that special spice they have on the table. My mom gets the side salad, which is also unlimited and they bring that before the food also by request.  My favorite entrees are the Royal Red Robin (burger with an egg over easy on top and bacon, which I get on the side and take home for my dog) and the Crispy Chicken sandwich. I ordered the adult chicken tenders and fries and the Tavern Double one time each and I liked them both also, but not enough to choose over my favorite entrees. I got the macaroni and cheese as an additional side once, but it was very filling (it was bottomless and I still couldn't even finish half) and I'd never choose it over the fries.   I ordered the Buzz Tavern Double once and I hated it. It's a double cheeseburger with special spicy sauce and mac and cheese in between the patties. It sounds good in theory, but I don't recommend it! My dad said the same about the smoky tavern double.   Make sure to join their loyalty club because you get a free burger during your birthday month, a free entree after 10 meals purchased and coupons every week. We've gotten coupons for free appetizers before and we tried the fried pickles and the onion rings. Neither were anything special and we never ordered them again. Besides, who needs apps with bottomless fries?  I'm not a big dessert person, but I ordered the birthday cake milkshake once and it was just ok. My sister likes the Cookie Magic shake. The other desserts sound good, but I've always gorged myself on too many fries to want to order them.   Red Robin is yummy, comforting and family friendly, so you have nothing to lose by stopping by when you can!

photos.caption: Photo of Red Robin Gourmet Burgers and Brews - Charlotte, NC, United States. Yummy bottomless fries with seasoned salt
Photo of Red Robin Gourmet Burgers and Brews - Charlotte, NC, United States. Skinny absolute freckled lemonade and red zombie drinks
Photo of Red Robin Gourmet Burgers and Brews - Charlotte, NC, United States. Royal Red Robin with fries - it comes with bacon, but he got it on the side

HOorOEVZlAmeXTluyt4xWQ.text: My first time here was with a group of coworkers to celebrate teacher appreciation. The host was great and our waitress great. The restaurant; however, wasn't very accommodating for teachers who weren't beef eaters. The teacher coupon was for tavern burgers; however, in our group were people like myself who do not eat red meat and others who don't eat meat at all. We were told that no substitutions could be made and if replacing the patty for turkey burger or black bean would result in paying full price. We understood and paid for our meals, but was very disappointed to learn had we gone to the RedRobin at NorthLake, our diet needs wouldn't have demanded full price as they were accommodating teachers who didn't eat beef no additional charge.

jJ24N3pxiUFmiPF9iwRlgw.text: If you are in the market for a charred to a crisp overdone burger this is your stop! Sadly both of our burgers were overdone to the point that any lover of a juicy medium burger would be turned off.  On the up side our server spotted the lack of enthusiasm and offered us menus to choose new items. Great service, questionable burgers. Pretzel bites are  great! :)

S_xOIYwPTnvCMaXbRv0tYQ.text: We had excellent service... kylee was super friendly and had was always checking if we wanted anything... food was piping hot and so good. .. will stop here again next time we are in North Carolina. .

oj7PFcm67w7IL75ePbquMA.text: Have not had good success with ordering pickup on two occasions. Food always cold. Sweet potato fries overcooked - oil needed changing. Buns dry. Went to restroom one time.. noticed trash under several tables. Will give it another shot in the future, though.

tcYbrS6e_1WvzCrWmWdwCA.text: New person sitting people and was very nice and outgoing. Our server was very capable, got order right on and kept drinks full. My burger was good, wife had fish and chips. Nice meal.

e_Zye9hSFPb3LoRofnWAsQ.text: When we first walked into the doors we had to wait for the manager to finish arguing with a customer over a $3 charge. He was incredibly rude to the lady. Then after five minutes of waiting we finally got seated and had to wait another five minutes for two waters. Our ready food sat in the window because the waitress had to help her two other tables. This will sound incredibly high maintenance, but RR changed their chicken tenders and they're disgusting. Didn't have the patience to talk to anyone because our waitress was constantly disappearing, kept hearing other servers ask where she was. Only good part of this trip was the lady with the red hair who eventually brought us our food and was quite pleasant. Other customers were even having issues too. Don't know what the heck is wrong with this location, but we will NOT be coming back. I'll make sure to spread the word too lol (I have been a server for 5 years and have a culinary degree, so it's not like I don't know what I'm talking about. Guess this is what I get for eating here.)

photos.caption: Photo of Red Robin Gourmet Burgers and Brews - Charlotte, NC, United States

QI5gQvPRU5Q9D_2NKSDYhQ.text: Just ordered delivery from this Red Robin. Almost $37 for an incorrect order. Missing onion straws and sauces. Food was so-so. Don't waste your time or money. Truly disappointing!

1RQU35caUZUD8zPuyIvz7w.text: My favorite go-to for a solid gourmet burger and bottomless broccoli and sweet potato fries! I never tried this place until I moved to Charlotte and now it's the only chain I visit when I don't know what else I want to eat.

gTvBqDkKgB2EABdFS-poDQ.text: Went here on a Sunday afternoon. EXCELLENT service by the hostess(don't remember her name) Extremely friendly and kind. Sydney was our waitress. She was friendly and knowledgeable. As we spoke to her we realized that she was the bartender and also serving tables. I remember coming last time and they would use their employees in this way. As we observed her activity at the bar increased where she had to make everyone's drinks. But in doing that her attention to our table became less and less. To the point where we no longer were given refills and the bottomless steak fries were not replenished. It's not Sydney's fault, I just wish Red Robin would use their employees in a more suitable way.

9-nrHhrq3pB-uNMuDx_Fsw.text: I just had the best burger I've ever had today at red robbin. It was the mad love burger and it was incredibly juicy and flavorful, blowing any other competition out of the water. The drinks are just as amazing with there unique flavors/combinations and being bottomless. The staff was on point with allowing us to take our time due to not visiting a red robin in a long time and was very friendly in general. I will be coming back here quite often.

8XhHdajFI4d7QH-u6CYmLg.text: I'm a fan of Red Robin.  It was one of the first places I could switch the regular burger patty with a decent veggie burger!  I'm not a fan of Boca burgers but they do have a Gardenburger which was pretty good.  I also ordered my personal favorite, towering onion rings as well as the garlic and herb fries and the nana-nana moo moo shake which was all delicious!  Overall a nice experience, clean atmosphere, and the staff was attentive and friendly.

photos.caption: Photo of Red Robin Gourmet Burgers and Brews - Charlotte, NC, United States. Bleu Ribbon Burger (substituted regular beef patty for the Gardenburger) with w side of garlic and herb fries.

-eljYRZu9bcD5Ko4zVDXRw.text: This experience was the worst I have ever had in my 43 yrs of dining out... where should I start... We walked into the restaurant to be meet by a manager on a personal phone call and the hostess taking a extremely long togo order. The manager never even made an attempt to help or even greet anyone that was at the door... 15 minutes later, hostess still taking a togo order and manager still hanging out talking on the phone. finally we where greeted by a employee that looked like "cousin It"... HAIR EVERYWHERE.... PEOPLE CHECK YOUR FOOD... THIS GIRL IS A FOODRUNNER (the girl could only see out of one eye with hair covering the other one). Walking to the table we noticed that the restaurant was trashed.... I mean trashed... and no one cleaning up. We counted 20 tables that was full of trash and dirty dishes, probably still dirty because the girl couldnt see but with one eye.  After being sat, I went to the restroom only to be meet by what looked like was a bloody fight where someone lost control of themselves and peed everywhere.... seats, floors, sinks, mirror... I mean even the soap to wash your hands looked like it was diluted with pee. This should have been my sign to high tail it out of this restaurant but I didnt and I regret that decision... First server came to the table and took ower drink order and walked away then followed by a second server asking the same thing.. we told her someone had already be to the table so she walked away..... to be followed by a third server asking what we wanted to drink... we were told then that the foodrunner ,that can only see out of one eye, was asking everyone to take our table. guessing she couldnt see the person she originally ask and thought she was still talking with the first server... guess we will never know. We recieved our food in a timely manner, however, the burger that i ordered didnt come with any toppings... while waiting for the toppings we noticed not one, not two, or not even three hairs but six human hairs resting on my plate, on my fries, on the burger and once we received the burger topping there were two more hairs in the toppings.  Not exceptable. needless to say we left without eating a thing.... This experience is a prime example of poor managerment and lack of health standards.... I do not recommend this place to anyone....Red Robin, yall need to do alot better.... (hair tied back or in a hat... clean your bathroom and regularly check them... manager being more pro-active instead of just going through the motions... If i could give yall a negative rating it would be a -25 stars..

TEPprwfnp4z-2RZhh0rvPQ.text: Shasta was absolutely brilliant.  She knew exactly what we needed for dietary needs and assisted in ordering them. She kept up on drinks and food. Definitely deserves a pay raise.   The bathroom could use some attention. One out of three sinks worked and the locks on the stalls were broken.   Other than that the food was good. Service was great.

gMvASe4ESPZdUVvxnE5fcA.text: Server Any was great! Food and atmosphere were very good as expected.  Really like the music and soccer on tv. The trash outside was disappointing (manager says a lot of cut throughs throw trash).

TrKUsuG2hqfsNmK7kAslQQ.text: Service was very lacking.  It took a while to get drinks and our order taken.  I wanted to pay with cash but couldn't find our server so I was forced to use the table top thing.  I ordered the French onion soup and sauteed shroom burger and substituted grilled chicken in place of the burger.  The soup was very disappointing!!  I got maybe a custard cup size of soup with a huge piece of bread and cheese on top.  The soup was literally 4 bites.  I placed my spoon in a photo so there's an idea of how skimpy the portion was.  The "burger" wasn't much better.  The mushrooms didn't have any garlic flavor like I was expecting.  It was a grilled chicken sandwich with cheese and boring mushrooms.  Again, I was very disappointed.  At least I was able to stuff my face with those endless fries...

photos.caption: Photo of Red Robin Gourmet Burgers and Brews - Charlotte, NC, United States. French Onion Soup
Photo of Red Robin Gourmet Burgers and Brews - Charlotte, NC, United States. Sauteed Shroom Burger made with grilled chicken
Photo of Red Robin Gourmet Burgers and Brews - Charlotte, NC, United States. French Onion Soup

wAT6smMLaRKbV7vPAIkG2w.text: When I decide to go out and eat by myself, it's a big deal for me. I realize I'm only going to spend $25 or $30, and that doesn't compare to a family of four or whatever, but I generally go out to eat with two or three of my friends, so treating me like I don't matter means that you've just negated future parties of three or four that will spend more. And I'm vocal. If my friends want to go out for lunch or dinner, and someone suggests a place I was treated badly at, I'm going to immediately say something like, "I don't like that place, how about...".  I visited Red Robin at around 4:30 this Saturday. It was busier than I would have expected at that time of day, but even so, it was maybe a fourth full, if that. The hostess confirmed that it was a table of one, then led me into the bar area without even asking if that was okay and tried to sit me at a small table. There were several open booths, but she acted surprised when I asked to sit at a booth instead. I gestured towards an open booth away from the occupied booths; I brought in a book, and I planned on reading while I ate. But she ignored me and sat me at the booth closest to the door (still in the bar area) and next to a table with customers that were engaged in a happy conversation.  I felt like I was being given the shaft since I was a single customer, but I was really looking forward to having some salmon and fries. I'm not a big burger fan, and I don't think this particular location has very good hamburgers to begin with, but I eat here fairly frequently because friends of mine work in the area and Red Robin is convenient for them. About a month ago, I decided to order the salmon, and it was extremely good. Combined with the steak fries (which honestly rank up there with McDonald's for the best fries available), and I had found a dish I liked even when I wasn't with friends.  But I sat at that table in the bar like an unwelcome visitor - and make no mistake, that's EXACTLY what I felt like - and for five minutes, no one came to serve me or even acknowledge my existence.  I left, and yes, I was the guy who said something extremely ugly to the hostess as I exited. I'm not proud of that, but I'm also not going to apologize.  If someone comes to your restaurant and wants to pay you to eat your food, they should expect to be treated with at least the minimal amount of respect a human being would treat another human being. I don't often dine alone, but when I do (and I'm thinking specifically of Longhorn, since I've been there a couple of times recently) I'm treated like a valued customer, like places like Longhorn treat everyone.  This was an extremely unpleasant experience, and I didn't even order any food or beverages, let alone eat. Maybe you might want to train your hosts and servers to treat people as human, even if they're not going to bring in as much money as a family or group might?

5rgTZckzgukDsCSAcdmb4w.text: Had a great dinner from Red Robin today. Since I am a member of their loyalty club I got a free tavern burger. They did not mention that I had to make a purchase of $10 dollars though. But it is okay because it gave me a chance to try other stuff. So that's what I did. I ordered the mozzarella sticks, fried mushrooms, and spinach artichoke dip. It was yummy. I ordered my food online. When I went to pick it up it was correct and they gave me some complimentary fries. I will say this though, they should get some kind of bag that fits the fry container cause she was walking outside with the fries all exposed. I have not been inside this location but I can't wait to go back to eat some more good food!!!!

photos.caption: Photo of Red Robin Gourmet Burgers and Brews - Charlotte, NC, United States. Creamy Artichoke &amp; Spinach Dip, Taco Tavern Burger,  Jump Starter Double with mozzarella sticks and fried mushrooms

yZLVH72gnji4jdXHT-YWTA.text: Great service, with no wait time when we visited on a chilly, Sunday afternoon.  My nephew wanted burgers to celebrate his gymnastics showcase, so I thought what better place than Red Robin Gourmet Burgers!    They had endless steak fries and soft drinks.   We had a party of six, and everyone left happy.  My nephews loved the fact that the fries and drinks [kept] coming.  The bacon on my burger was crispy and perfect, and the onion rings were even better.   My sister got a wedge burger and broccoli, both looked well... Yum!    We didn't even need to part with our card to pay.  We paid via Ziosk; the small kiosk on the table.  Easy peasy one, two, threezies.

photos.caption: Photo of Red Robin Gourmet Burgers and Brews - Charlotte, NC, United States. Red Robin Gourmet Burgers
Photo of Red Robin Gourmet Burgers and Brews - Charlotte, NC, United States. I love this picture
Photo of Red Robin Gourmet Burgers and Brews - Charlotte, NC, United States. Table salt is seasoned sa

OtS4hRrXmBmvjdP1hESluQ.text: I had a taste for something out of the norm and that's when I remembered that Red Robin has a new "This Season" menu with lots of great new choices as well as some old classics!  There were six of us dining so we had a variety of dishes and they all looked and smelled amazing!  I'm very doing the healthy thing so I'm very selective in my menu choices but I must say the wedge burger and the endless broccoli with garlic butter sauce was simply Devine! I ordered four servings of broccoli but the last one they brought  was a mini sized portion so I guess either they were tired of me requesting more if the "endless" broccoli or the endless was coming to an end! Either way I had my fill so I won't complain but I will be back for more of it very soon!

photos.caption: Photo of Red Robin Gourmet Burgers and Brews - Charlotte, NC, United States. Front of the new menu
Photo of Red Robin Gourmet Burgers and Brews - Charlotte, NC, United States. Flip side of the new This Season menu...This Season menu side 2
Photo of Red Robin Gourmet Burgers and Brews - Charlotte, NC, United States. The new This Season menu

nEhKxgkq-pzbLkTxI6R2OA.text: Came here on the last night of the month (7/31/2018) to redeem my free birthday burger. I've been here on lots of occasions and never had an Issue. But tonight was a bit of a different story. I walked in and requested to sit on the patio. The hostess asked the waitress that was working that area and she stated that she could not work the patio even though she only had one other customer in her section at that time. Mind you, she was working the bar, but working the patio would not have a inconvenienced her one bit.  Despite that, I decided to stay. Big mistake! I sat down and ordered my food and drinks all in one go. I asked her for her suggestion for the burger and she suggested the smoke and pepper burger. I added onion straws to the Burger and ordered the adult freckled lemonade.   While waiting for my food, I had time to finish my drink, run to the car and read two chapters in my book. When the food arrived it was lukewarm at best. The burger looked much more chintzy and the normal size and all the ingredients including the onion straws were also called. Worst of all, the fries were also cold. I even ordered a second order of the bottomless fries and they were also cold. Actually, colder than the first.  Most of this time, my waitress was actually missing in action. I only saw her when she came to bring my drink and bring my food and then the rest the time she was too busy trying to clean up the place to stop and make sure I was OK. Mind you, when I arrived it was nowhere close to closing time. I would say around 8 o'clock. I didn't leave until 930.   When I went to settle on my bill on their tablet system, I punched in my rewards number from my free burger and it wouldn't come off. I asked her about it and she said "Oh if I had known It was a birthday burger, I wouldn't have suggested that one. The finest burgers do not count with the birthday burger promotion." She stood there for a moment just kind of looking at me and then she said she would go ask her manager to see what he could do. Because she felt like it was her fault for suggesting the burger in the first place.   Now mind you the menu has changed quite a bit since the last time I was there ( a few months ago) and obviously the birthday promotion has changed since last year. I distinctly remember ordering a brand new burger last year and the coupon having no limitations on that.   Also, bear in mind it is the last day the month (The promotion is  only good during your birthday month) so on 7/31/2018, there's no way that I can use it another time. She comes back in the most the manager could do was to give me 50% off my burger only. Mind you the value of the regular burger is about $10-$11 I only received about six dollars off. So they actually made money off of me. I was all around disappointed. The service, the food, the unwillingness to honor the coupon, it was all just too much bad service for one interaction.   I will not be back to this location.

photos.caption: Photo of Red Robin Gourmet Burgers and Brews - Charlotte, NC, United States. Bottom of my Absolut Freckled Lemonade
Photo of Red Robin Gourmet Burgers and Brews - Charlotte, NC, United States. Royal Red Robin

f7KKewAqO4Kqs4ICrqqnYg.text: Red Robin is always my go to for great tasting ( and looking) burgers. I never had a problem with the food here but had to do a special review for the one time I stepped out the box and did not regret it. I decided to venture outside of the bigger world and try their salmon burger. Everybody go try it now! It was delicious! Cooked perfectly and the sauce on it was the perfect compliment! Not dry, not u Dee cooked, just perfect! Also it was a huge piece of salmon, the same size as one of their bigger burgers. Can't wait to try it again. Of course the service and our drinks were also great as always. Red Robin always seems to come through!

photos.caption: Photo of Red Robin Gourmet Burgers and Brews - Charlotte, NC, United States

VevmVtbc7jBrNsXdyhzokQ.text: Now that I'm a mom, I feel like this review needs a facelift!  I gave 4 stars before being a mom and sitting in the 21 and over section, but now that we are sitting in the back it is a different experience!  We have a two-year-old, and I will say that all the servers have been awesome being sweet to him and giving him attention. The hostesses are also super sweet and gave him attention bringing him a balloon.    My favorite food hasn't changed, I am still eating in the mushroom burger all of the time and I still love the fries and onion rings!! You cannot beat that smoky sauce that they give with onion rings. This is a splurge for me calorie wise, but sometimes it's just worth it!

jblRF2L5CQaEfkh1HeHyBw.text: We ordered a few dishes for takeout. The kids' mac-n-cheese was tiny -- probably about 1/4 of a cup portion. The other kids' meal was mini corn dogs, and both came with a side of broccoli. One of the broccoli servings was a lone piece of broccoli (I'm serious) and the other one was about a cupful. Even so, the broccoli was weirdly textured, like it had been dried out prior to cooking. A side of "unlimited" fries, even after requesting a generous portion, was about nine sad steak fries.  Sizes of orders were very small and inconsistent. We were disappointed with the lack of quality presented in our takeout order. It most definitely was not worth the price we paid.

R0iEVojmERu4KBhazjpB9Q.text: Went to Red Robin's for the first we really enjoyed our burgers. But service sucks we got bottomless ff and never got them had to go to the bar to ask for check. They gave me the wrong check. Had to go ask again for our right check told the manager it was the wrong check and that we didn't get our fries he said sorry and handed me the check. Way to goooo!! I would totally understand if they were busy but there was just us and one other table we didn't even get silverware:(

-V29khST5KmCOS8rX49piQ.text: Although I ordered through Postmates and a portion of the responsibility for this review belongs to them, Red Robin also failed to uphold their end as well.   As mentioned I ordered through Postmates, and included a few special requests to make my meal vegetarian-friendly (no bacon, no chili, BOCA patties, etc.), to which Postmates & Red Robin paid no attention. We got our meal and bacon. was. on. everything. The cheese fries were covered in chili and everything was missing ranch, salads included (how is that okay??).  I don't know if the staff just felt like doing their own thing or if they thought I was joking about the no meat thing, but I'm so disappointed, $50 down the drain.

rnt_cbg6H68svra5dONJJw.text: Never been here before. Set down and discovered it's a burger restaurant which is very fine by me. When asked about temperatures the waitress said "color or no color". I said color please.   Let's get straight to the criticism. A thiiiiiin burger on a big bun that was essentially undercooked!   Even properly cooked would fail to make a difference. I will never willingly return. These problems can't possibly be fixed.

kZbWLVyScWlCqTs1EZ5q1Q.text: Improved wait staff and great manager.  I ordered a burger with 4 special requests (not so special).  Egg to be over easy, runny yolk is crucial; swiss instead of American; onion straws (get my food friends straws they didnt want so they came on the side; medium (some pink in the patty);  The burger hit 3 out of 4 perfectly.  The burger was all brown through and through.  The manager vowed to personally remake the burger and I was brought fresh fries to tide me over during the short wait.  The burger came back perfect.  This was great service.  The waitress was great too, she got all my order just right.  We left a large thank you tip.  The burger was also taken off the bill, that waa a great gesture and won ky repeat business.  Camp sauce, I like it.  It has none of the heat of the Bad Daddy ketchup but the flavor is great.  I prefer the heat but not everyone does.  The burgers here are better than Ruby Tuesdays and most other similar places.  What really pleases me are the unlimited sides. You wanna strap on the feedback and go nuts?  You can eat fries, sweet potatoes, or brocoli.  I feel healthy after having four servings of the broc.  You can take a lot if liberty with how you order your burger.  Change the cheese, add onion straws, add mushrooms, whatever.  You can't sneak in free eggs or bacon but lots of toppings.  They added new touch pads to order stuff and call over a server.  The summon doesn't always work as inrended. It beats my owl eyes, where I stare st the waiter until they come over.  I like it here more and more and the birthday burger doesn't hurt.  Child portions are very large.  Dare I say a good value.

4ngV91kecjgNnEMwcxT0Kg.text: The food was amazing and our waitress Sherri was on top of things and very friendly and accommodating.  I dont usually review chains but this visit had to be the exception!

Lo8lyTsu7O97Za0En9vusA.text: Burger was delicious. Fries were fresh and hot. Drinks reasonably priced. The ambiance is always chill and a good way to relax after work. Definitely a good burger go to spot

photos.caption: Photo of Red Robin Gourmet Burgers and Brews - Charlotte, NC, United States

N3F_oGdg_HcDT6jrNUWHRA.text: The restaurant was busy it was a Friday evening. Are waiter Oryan was pleasant and worked hard to make sure we had everything we need. The Food was ok. My wife and I both had burgers. I had the ghost pepper burger and it had a little bite. Thought it was very good. My wife seemed to enjoy her burger. The table next to us just let there kids scream and shrek. Not the restaurants fault. If it wasn't for that it would have been decent.

4UyhoQOXror0l6_huBw-Jg.text: Just had lunch here over the weekend for the very 1st time. It was one for the books and they weren't lying on their commercials that the fries were indeed bottomless and the food was indeed yum. I plan to return here in the near future and encourage others to give them a go.

RpZBUPTAvMMNJJBr9Cs1lw.text: Excellent food with excellent service ...very tasty..if you have not been there in a while it's changed so much for the better

photos.caption: Photo of Red Robin Gourmet Burgers and Brews - Charlotte, NC, United States

pOZD_9Yo3qzFXwR4osLWyg.text: Online order # 198240020. Normally my experience here isn't so bad but today was. I ordered for the first time the caesar chicken wrap and I had more wrap than chicken. I will NOT ORDER THAT AGAIN!  Also, the side caesar salad only had lettuce, no croutons no cheese. I asked the server if he noticed the same thing and he said yes. He took my salad back to the back and when he came back to the front. He said I had them put some cheese on the salad but were out of croutons. Are you serious???? A caesar salad without croutons is like eating a salad with only lettuce. Needless to say, he never offered me anything different since this restaurant was out of croutons.  Which was very disappointing. Update...  Went today to see if this location could get it right and of course NOPE they couldn't.  Guest services sent me a reward for my horrible experience yesterday. So, I went back today to use the reward. Big mistake at this location.. I even took pictures. I went today to get the wedge burger.  I believe it's just time for me to give this red robin location a break. For some reason, I'm having bad experiences here for the past 2 days. Did they really expect me to eat the hard part of the lettuce and I asked for all ingredients on the side because I DID NOT want my lettuce wet after I heat up my meat and cheese up.  Burger burnt anyways. Thank you for the reward. But, this is ridiculous!  I do not EXPECT another reward but I do want guest services to be aware of there locations and what's going on. Please have a talk with your kitchen staff ASAP because clearly they do not care!

photos.caption: Photo of Red Robin Gourmet Burgers and Brews - Charlotte, NC, United States
Photo of Red Robin Gourmet Burgers and Brews - Charlotte, NC, United States
